testCase.name: getCharacters doit retourner tous les personnages
getCharacterById doit retourner un personnage par son ID
getCharacterById doit retourner undefined pour un ID inexistant
AboutPage Component should render the About information
AboutPage Component should change the document title

CharactersList Component should display a list with one character
CharactersList Component should display a list with multiple characters
